sentences.sContent: These companies, cut off from bank loans at reasonable rates of interest, had turned instead to supposedly usurious moneylenders, known as the curb market.
sentences.sContent_eng: These companies, cut off from bank loans at reasonable rates of interest, had turned instead to supposedly usurious moneylenders, known as the curb market.
sentences.sCn: 这些中小企业无法以合理的贷款利率从银行获得贷款，他们因此只好求助于所谓高利贷放贷机构。

trans.tranCn: 进行高利剥削的, 高利贷的
trans.tranOther: a usurious price or rate of interest14 is unfairly high
